roleset.name: brainwash

example.name: one arg
example.text: Complete units have been trained and indoctrinated [*]in the U.S.S.R. and other East bloc nations; 30,000 to 40,000 of these troops have returned.
example.arg: [*]in the U.S.S.R. and other East bloc nations;

example.name: ARG1
example.text: Complete units have been trained and indoctrinated in the U.S.S.R. and other East bloc nations ; 30,000 to 40,000 of these troops have returned .
example.arg: in the U.S.S.R. and other East bloc nations

example.name: all args
example.text: This sad state of affairs has been a cumulative result of the leftist/socialist takeover of the country's media, entertainment, academic, and bureaucratic establishments, and their indoctrination of the populace with their ideologies.

roleset.note: INDOCTRINATE-V NOTES: Indoctrinate could also be taken as 'to make into a doctor.' (from indoctrinate.01-v)
INDOCTRINATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, indoctrinate.01. No VNcls. (from indoctrination.01-n)
